content.rendered:
We are excited to extend a warm welcome to our newest team member, Samantha Hill! Samantha joins our growing Creative Website Marketing team as our new Digital Marketing Manager.

Based in Minneapolis, MN, she is certified in Google Ads (search, display & mobile) and helps bring our creative efforts to life. She enjoys harnessing the power of digital advertising to help brands tell their stories, using a variety of strategies and content types.

In her free time she can be found playing soccer, listening to classic rock-n-roll and entertaining her two cats. We look forward to working with Samantha to continually elevate our services and results for customers across the US and Canada.

Want to say hello? Contact the team here.

Creative Website Marketing is a digital marketing agency in Nashville, TN, helping businesses throughout the country execute strategic brand awareness + lead generation efforts.

@graph.name: Drew Hill
@graph.description: Drew Hill is the Managing Director at Creative Website Marketing, a Nashville, TN based digital marketing agency that partners with businesses to increase brand awareness and lead generation through paid advertising, SEO, content marketing and relevant social media strategies. To collaborate with Creative Website Marketing or discuss your digital marketing needs, please visit our website at www.CreativeWebsiteMarketing.com.
